div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1781 Nineveh, Assyria, 1929-1930 Burial: c. 100-90 B.C. Contents: 597 AE. From excavations Nineveh Disposition: London Le Rider, Iranica Ant. 1967, pp. 4-20, illus. Some of the coins show Parthian portraits, but only Mithradates II can be iden- tified with certainty
